item.title: Country Crisp Cereals
item.description: This is a recipe for making Jordan’s Country Crisp-like cereals. â²ï¸ Prep time: 10 min ğŸ³Cook time: 2 h ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 7 Ingredients Oat Flakes (270 g - 800 mL) Rice Flour (or any other flour) (20 g - 55mL) Sugar (100 g) Crushed Hazelnuts (20 g) Oil (any type) (60 g - 75 mL) Water (50 g) Chocolate (70 g) (optional) Vanilla Extract (1/2 tsp) (optional) Directions Preheat the oven at 120Â°C.
